title: BRIEF-Mawana Sugars Gets Letter From Promoter Shriram Regarding Review Of His Shareholding
text:
BRIEF-Mawana Sugars Gets Letter From Promoter Shriram Regarding Review Of His Shareholding

Stock Markets 17 minutes ago (Sep 02, 2019 14:20)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Mawana Sugars Gets Letter From Promoter Shriram Regarding Review Of His Shareholding Sept 2 (Reuters) - Mawana Sugars Ltd : * GOT LETTER FROM PROMOTER SIDDHARTH SHRIRAM REGARDING REVIEW OF HIS SHAREHOLDING * SHRIRAM PLANS TO REVIEW PROMOTERS INTEREST IN CO, INCLUDING EXPLORING JVS, SCHEMES OF ARRANGEMENT, SALE OF PART OR ALL OF STAKE IN CO

BRIEF-Mawana Sugars Gets Letter From Promoter Shriram Regarding Review Of His Shareholding
